pageContext.title: Send and receive money
pageContext.description: HaloPesa Customers enjoy the affordable Charges when making various HaloPesa transactions.

children.value: HaloPesa enable users to send and receive money between HaloPesa and HaloPesa, also to/from other mobile financial service providers. HaloPesa transactions with MPesa, Airtel Money, TPesa, TigoPesa and EzyPesa users are so as easy as transacting with other HaloPesa users 24/7 with minimum charges.
⦁	Select 2-6 to send money to other networks
Enjoy our Affordable Tariffs as follows:
